LOGIN_REQUIRED_MSG: Please, enter your login and password before proceed!
LOGOUT_SUCCESS: Thank you for using our application!
NO_INTERVALS_MSG: Please, add new interval before proceed!
PASSWORD_INFO: Minimal length of password shall be not less than 8 characters, it shall have at least one upper-case letter and one number.
EMAIL_INFO: This email address will be used as recepient for notifications from our application.
TIMEZONE_INFO: Timezone set is required to propely display the time and date of payments and other values.
PROPERTIES_INVALID_PASSWORD: Existing password is not valid! Please, authorize yourself first!
PROPERTIES_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: New password is too short. Min 8 symbols required!
PROPERTIES_PASSWORD_LETTER: New password shall contain at least one uppercase letter!
PROPERTIES_PASSWORD_NUMBER: New password shall contain at least one number!
ABOUT_APP_TASK: The main goal of this application is to help you to track your expenses and plan your budget. How its works?
ABOUT_CALCULATIONS: There is pretty simple calculations behind this app. Imagine, that you got salary every 10 days, and cash you got is 100€. In this case, it is easy to calculate, that every day you may spend {{180/10}}€.
ABOUT_IDEAL_CASE: In ideal case, your expeneses graph will match the first example.
ABOUT_EXPENSES: In real world, your expenses will differ every day, so you shall apply correctins to got the remaining cache and plan your following expenses.
ABOUT_YOUR_TASK: This application automated those actions and all, you need to do, is simply enter your expenses in the expenses table and track, that your remaining cache (blue bars) not lower than orange line.

ABOUT_THANK_YOU: Thank you for using our application!
